description: AccessRequest is the Schema for the accessrequests API

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: AccessRequestSpec defines the desired state of AccessRequest

application.description:
Application defines the Argo CD Application to assign the elevated
permission

name.description: Name refers to the Argo CD Application name

namespace.description: Namespace refers to the namespace where the Argo CD Application lives

duration.description:
Duration defines the ammount of time that the elevated access
will be granted once approved

role.description:
TargetRoleName defines the role name the user will be assigned
to once the access is approved

friendlyName.description: FriendlyName defines a name for this role

ordinal.description: Ordinal defines an ordering number of this role compared to others

templateRef.description: TemplateName defines the role template the user will be assigned

name.description: Name refers to the RoleTemplate name

namespace.description: Namespace refers to the namespace where the RoleTemplate lives

subject.description: Subject defines the subject for this access request

username.description: Username refers to the entity requesting the elevated permission

status.description: AccessRequestStatus defines the observed state of AccessRequest

items.description:
AccessRequestHistory contain the history of all status transitions associated
with this access request

details.description: Details may contain detailed information about the transition

status.description: RequestState is the new status assigned to this access request

transitionTime.description: TransitionTime is the time the transition is observed

requestState.description:
Status defines the different stages a given access request can be
at a given time.
